00033 #define     COMPRESSION_NONE            1       // dump mode 
00034 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITTRLE        2       // CCITT modified Huffman RLE 
00035 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITTFAX3       3       // CCITT Group 3 fax encoding 
00036 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITT_T4    3       // CCITT T.4 (TIFF 6 name) 
00037 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITTFAX4       4       // CCITT Group 4 fax encoding 
00038 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITT_T6    4       // CCITT T.6 (TIFF 6 name) 
00039 #define     COMPRESSION_LZW                     5       // Lempel-Ziv  & Welch 
00040 #define     COMPRESSION_OJPEG           6       // !6.0 JPEG 
00041 #define     COMPRESSION_JPEG            7       // %JPEG DCT compression 
00042 #define     COMPRESSION_NEXT            32766   // NeXT 2-bit RLE 
00043 #define     COMPRESSION_CCITTRLEW       32771   // #1 w/ word alignment 
00044 #define     COMPRESSION_PACKBITS        32773   // Macintosh RLE 
00045 #define     COMPRESSION_THUNDERSCAN     32809   // ThunderScan RLE
